subsc: Compulsory pension and unemployment insurance,General finance sector,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Pension Reform
            Adjustment Loan Project are to increase domestic savings,
            strengthen the medium term fiscal outlook, broaden access to
            long-term external financing, and provide a clear signal of
            the Government's determination to persevere. This will
            occur by: a) deepening pension reform; b) improving the
            efficiency of capital markets; and c) earmarking part of the
            privatization proceeds to back pension obligations. The loan
            will consist of a single trance to the Republic of Peru.
            Implementation will be shared by the Ministry of Economy and
            Finance and agencies responsible for social security and
            capital markets. Fifty percent of the funds will be set
            aside to finance part of the focus of the Debt and Debt
            Service Reduction (DDSR) agreement.
